name: checkgit
description: A task that checks a branch with the specified name for the presence of a tag and/or that the latest commit from the specified branch is involved in the build
author: Adeptik

inputs.name: branch
inputs.label: Branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the branch to which the source code must belong during the build. For example origin/master

inputs.name: tagValidation
inputs.label: Has tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: Checks that the sources have at least one tag

inputs.name: headValidation
inputs.label: Latest commit
inputs.helpMarkDown: Checking that this is the most recent commit in the branch
